div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 297 Delos, 1912 (316) Burial: c. 110 B.C. (T); c. 69 (Lewis) Contents: c. 50 AR. From excavations Athens: New Style tetradr. Disposition: Athens Roussel, Délos, p. 48, note 4 (70) † Thompson, Athens (Delos ΞΘ), pp. 513-4, illus. Lewis, NC 1962, pp. 282-3 Hackens, BCH 1905, p. 556 A coin of Andreas and one of Dositheos are not in Svoronos' inventory and may not belong to the bd. as published in Athens
